li.a: Arizona Conservatory for Academics and Arts
Sequoia Pathfinder Academy at Verrado Way and I-10

div.p:
Pathway is a Tuition-Free, Public Charter School
in the city of Maricopa. We are a highly performing
school that serves students in K-12th Grades.
div.span: Every child at Sequoia Pathway will be known.

img.alt: Sequoia Pathway Cheerleading Team in the spotlight

div.p: To provide an academically rigorous program of study in an environment that supports learners as unique individuals, while fostering a commitment to community through the arts, athletics and altruism.
